definitions.definition: To have an absolute requirement for.
definitions.example: Living things need water to survive.

definitions.definition: To want strongly; to feel that one must have something.
definitions.example: After ten days of hiking, I needed a shower and a shave.

definitions.definition: (modal verb) To be obliged or required (to do something).
definitions.example: You need not go if you don't want to.

definitions.definition: To be required; to be necessary.
